Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: We don't currently provide any metrics ... only the framework has been merged ... so no reason for this to be backported.

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: I'm not sure why this is a story; this seems to be a detail that needs to be considered when surfacing metrics through statsd; in prometheus we'd probably expect these to be labels.

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: We expose a {{prefix}} configuration option for statsd that can be used to differentiate notes.
